name: ALILIA-亚利利亚的精灵们
description: In the isolated forest of Alilia, there are magical wizards that can see the elves, living happily. One day, the laws of nature gradually collapsed. In order to save all this, the protagonists who can manipulate the magic of the elves will shoulder the responsibility of repairing the laws of nature...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor:  Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics:  Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card:  Additional Notes:
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64bit versions required) Processor:  Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics:  Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card:  Additional Notes:
